text: The Chile national under-18 and under-19 basketball team is a national basketball team of Chile, administered by the Federación de Basquetbol de Chile.FIBA National Federations – Chile, fiba.com, accessed 18 Aug 2016. It represents the country in international under-18 and under-19 (under age 18 and under age 19) basketball competitions. A prominent former member has been Nico Carvacho, who later joined Colorado State Rams men's basketball program as well as Chile's senior national basketball team.Nico Carvacho growing up quickly at Colorado State Kelly Lyell (Coloradoan), 2 December 2016. Accessed 26 March 2020. ==See also== *Chile national basketball team *Chile national under-17 basketball team *Chile women's national under-19 basketball team ==References== ==External links== * Archived records of Chile team participations under Category:National under-19 basketball teams
title: Chile men's national under-18 basketball team
